name: Marty Quest
description:
Marty Quest is a 2D, top down, action / adventure game, inspired by The Legend of Zelda. Explore the depths of a treacherous dungeon, fighting enemies, finding items, unlocking doors, solving puzzles, and collecting treasure along the way!

Features

  • 20+ levels
  • 5 different items
  • 6 kinds of enemies
  • Collectible gems
  • Save and load functionality
  • Customizable settings
  • Simple controls
  • Local Co-op multiplayer
  • Fun and challenging!
